title: Minimal Impact of Healthcare Costs on Poverty
description: In 2017, only 0.01% of Panama's population was pushed below the $2.15 poverty line due to out-of-pocket healthcare expenses, indicating a robust healthcare support system.

title: Negligible Arms Exports
description: In 2019, Panama's arms exports were valued at just 1,000,000 SIPRI trend indicator values, reflecting a minimal focus on military exports.

title: Low Export Taxation
description: In 2018, Panama's taxes on exports were recorded at 150 current LCU, showcasing a favorable environment for exporters.
